Class PorterStopWordFilter

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
AdornedWordFilter
public class PorterStopWordFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdornedWordFilter

An Adorned word filter for Martin Porter's stop word list.

These English stop words were suggested by Martin Porter.
